name: Bean and Olive
text:
BEAN & OLIVE HAPPY HOUR MENU DIP & SIP Tuesday - Friday 4pm - 6pm
DIP $10.50
Spinach Dip Creamy mixture of cream cheese, spinach, onion, peppers and spices. Served with tortilla chips & veggies.
Pizza Rolls & Dip Baked egg roll wrap filled with pepperoni, ham & mozzarella cheese. Served with marinara.
Loaded Hummus Dip Roasted garlic hummus topped with tomato, cucumber, red onion, lettuce & olives. Served with naan bread & veggies.
SIP $5.50
Lakehead Beer 355ml Light lager 4%, IPA 6.5%.
Crafty Elk Hard Juice 355ml Mango & Honey 4.5%, Cranberry, blueberry & açai 4.5%, Blackberry, Sunset 4.5%.
Mimosa 3.5 oz Prosecco 12%, topped with Orange juice.
BEAN & OLIVE FOOD MENU 4:00pm - Close
Pico De Gallo & Chips | $14.50 Fresh salsa made with tomato, onion, cilantro, jalapeño & lime juice. Paired with GF tortilla chips.
Guacamole & Chips | $15.50 Fresh guacamole paired with GF tortilla chips.
Loaded Hummus Plate | $16.95 Roasted garlic hummus topped with tomato, cucumber, onion, lettuce, olives. Paired with naan bread or veggies.
Flatbread Pizza | $17.95 Deluxe, Meat Lovers, Hawaiian, Veggie, & Alfredo.
Ceasar Salad | $15.95 Romaine lettuce, bacon, Parmesan cheese, croutons. Mixed with creamy ceasar dressing.
Loaded Nachos | $21.95 GF tortilla chips, cheese, peppers, tomato, bacon, onion. Served with salsa & sour cream.
Charcuterie Board | $21.95 Perfect for sharing! A mix of meats, cheeses, cracker & savoury bites.
Spinach Dip | $16.50 A creamy mixture of cream cheese, spinach, onion, peppers & spices. Served with tortilla chips & veggies.
Chicken Strips | $15.95 Tender chicken breast strips served with side fries and dipping sauce. *3 strips served.
Poutine | $15.50 Classic poutine made with fries topped gravy & cheese curds.
Pizza Rolls | $15.95 Baked egg roll wrap filled with pepperoni, ham & mozzarella cheese. Served with marinara sauce. *4 rolls served.
Antojitos | $16.95 Baked flour tortilla wrap filled with cream cheese, shredded cheeses, jalapeño, red & yellow pepper. Served with sour cream. *2 rolls served.
BEAN & OLIVE BEVERAGES
MARTINIS
B&O Dirty Martini | $14 2.5 oz Vodka or Gin, Olive juice.
Classic Martini | $14 2.5 oz Vodka or Gin, Dry vermouth, olive juice.
Espresso Martini | $14 1 oz Vodka, 1 oz Kahlua, Espresso, simple syrup.
Chocolate Martini | $14 1.5 oz Vodka, 1.5 oz Crème de cacao, cream, syrup.
Cosmopolitan | $14 1.5 oz Citron vodka, .75 oz Cointreau, lime & cranberry juices.
Lemon drop | $14 1.5 oz Citron vodka, .5 oz Cointreau, lemon juice & simple syrup.
Appletini | $14 1.5 oz Vodka, 1 oz Sour Apple, apple juice.
Elderflower Martini | $14 1 oz St. Germain, 1 oz Gin, lemon juice.
Cucumber Martini | $15 1.5 oz Cucumber vodka, .5 oz St. Germain, lemon juice & simple syrup.
COCKTAILS
Margarita | $14 2 oz Tequila, lime juice, simple syrup.
Old Fashioned | $14 1.5 oz Whiskey, 2 dashes bitters, simple syrup.
Negroni | $14 1 oz Campari, 1 oz Gin, .5 oz vermouth, carbonated water.
Paloma | $13 2 oz Tequila, lime & grapefruit juices, soda water.
Tom Collins | $13 2 oz Gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, club soda.
Moscow Mule | $14 1.5 oz Vodka, lime juice, ginger beer.
Whiskey Sour | $12 1.5 oz Whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup.
Long Island | $13 .5 oz Vodka, .5 oz Rum, .5 oz gin, .5 oz tequila, .5 oz cointreau, coke & lime juice.
Caesar | $11 2 oz Vodka, Worcestershire, tabasco, clamato, lemon, lime & pickle juices.
SPARKLING SPRITZ
Aperol | $12 3 oz Prosecco, 2 oz Aperol, soda water.
Hugo | $14 3 oz Prosecco, 1 oz St. Germain, soda water.
Limoncello | $14 3 oz Prosecco, 1 oz Limoncello, soda water.
Mimosa | $11 4 oz Prosecco, 3 oz OJ.
French 75 | $14 1 oz Gin, 2oz Prosecco, .5 lemon juice, .5 simple syrup.
Ranch Water | $12 1.5 oz Silver Tequila, lime juice, sparkling water.
Prosecco | $12 7 oz flute.
Bellini | $12 4 oz Prosecco & peach puree.
Cranberry Fizz | $12 4 oz Prosecco, 1 oz Cointreau, cranberry juice.
